definition: dawn/fig. the dawn of a new era
daybreak/dawn/the dawn of a new epoch (metaphor)/Taiwan pr. [shu4]

sentences.english: This precise drawing glimmers in the architectural detail.
sentences.chinese: 这在建筑细部的绘制曙光。

sentences.english: We meet like two travelers on their journeys, at a point of time, and together wait for the morning sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们像偶遇的旅者，在某时某刻，一起等待曙光。

sentences.english: When dawn came dim the land was lost.
THE giants of the mining industry might be forgiven a little wistfulness .
sentences.chinese: 制造业巨头们或许又可见到一丝曙光。

sentences.english: Interview with refugees internally displaced by eart…
sentences.chinese: 周曙光采访在成都街头避灾的难民。

sentences.english: The little light fades the immense and diaphanous shadows.
sentences.chinese: 微微曙光把庞大透明的阴影冲淡了。

sentences.english: In the moment of love, the nature of emptiness dawns nakedly…
sentences.chinese: 当爱的霎那，空灵乍现赤裸的曙光。

sentences.english: Morning is when I am awake and there is a dawn in me.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，在我苏醒之时，曙光已然照临内心。

sentences.english: They saw gleams of daylight through the cracks.
sentences.chinese: 他们从缝隙中看到了黎明的曙光。

sentences.english: The bird-song is the echo of the morning light back from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿的歌声是大地曙光在清晨的回音。

sentences.english: 'We can finally see a light at the end of the tunnel.'
sentences.chinese: 我们终于可以看到隧道尽头曙光乍现。

sentences.english: Manchester United's championship hopes, for the 24th consecutive season, had long gone cold.
sentences.chinese: 曼联的冠军希望，24年还是看不到曙光。

sentences.english: Such doubt sees the light of a post-scientific era.
sentences.chinese: 这种怀疑，使我们看到了后科学时代的曙光。

sentences.english: Dawn is expected to operate for eight or more years, and there are no refueling stations out there.
sentences.chinese: 曙光号预期工作8年以上，但那里却没有燃料补给站。

sentences.english: The snow glistened in the dawn light.
sentences.chinese: 雪在平明的曙光中闪烁。

definition: darkness comes before dawn/things can only get better (idiom)
pinyin: li2 ming2 qian2 de5 hei1 an4

definition: first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
to be exposed to the sun/in a position facing the sun

Chaoyang district in east and northeast Beijing, a county level district of Beijing municipality/Chaoyang prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/Chaoyang district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市, Jilin/Chaoyang county in Chaoyang 朝陽|朝阳[Chao2 yang2], Liaoning
